title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Bipartisan senators rebuke White House move to end legal aid for unaccompanied minors
items.description: The letter obtained by NPR marks a rare bipartisan critique from Capitol Hill of the administration's immigration policy.

items.title: How to request a tax extension from the IRS
items.description: Filing a tax extension is easy. But it's important to know what you're getting into, including what to do if you owe money to the IRS.

items.title: The Taliban banned Afghan girls from school. Low-paid carpet weaving is now their lifeline
items.description: The BBC speaks to young women who are now working to support their families in one of few jobs they are allowed to do.

items.title: French prisons hit by wave of overnight attacks
items.description: Vehicles were set on fire in prison car parks outside several prisons across the country.

items.title: Trump freezes $2bn in Harvard funding after university rejects demands
items.description: The White House sent a sweeping list of requirements to the university last week, which it said were aimed at fighting antisemitism.

items.title: Man detained in Caribbean for famed crime reporter's 2021 murder

items.description: A new study has found that fewer people crossed state lines for abortions in 2024 than the previous year.
